cancer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal
cancer.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
She was told last year that she had cancer.
He died of cancer last month.
a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
cancer.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an evil influence that affects a lot of people and is difficult to stop
cancer.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Drug abuse is the cancer of our society.
cancer.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the fourth sign of the zodiac, represented by a crab, which some people believe affects the character and life of people born between June 22 and July 23
cancer.translation[1].definitions[1].def: someone who was born between June 22 and July 23
